ðŸ“– Summary: ToonComposer streamlines cartoon production by using generative AI for post-keyframing, automating the inbetweening and colorization processes. It reduces the manual effort traditionally required in animation, turning hours of work into a seamless process. The tool provides a Gradio interface for users to interact with the model and generate animations.
